## Budget Breakdown (per person estimate, for 5 days)

- **Flights** (Delhiâ€“Bali return): â‚¹45,000â€“65,000 (book early on cheapoair.com)
- **Hotels/Villa (mid/upper segment):** â‚¹25,000â€“35,000 (4 nights shared)
- **Transport (private driver, cabs, boats):** â‚¹10,000â€“15,000
- **Food & Drinks:** â‚¹11,000â€“15,000
- **Activities/Tickets:** â‚¹8,000â€“12,000
- **Emergency/shopping buffer:** â‚¹8,000â€“10,000

**Total:** ~â‚¹1,30,000â€“1,50,000 per person

---

## Essential Travel Tips

- **Payments:** Cards work at hotels/major restaurants, but carry some cash for taxis & markets
- **Connectivity:** Buy a local SIM at the airport for cheap 4G data
- **Clothing:** Light layers, swimwear, hat, and a shawl/sarong for temples
- **Health:** Use bottled water, apply strong sunscreen
- **Culture:** Respect temple dress codes, don't step on offerings

---

## Pre-Trip Checklist

- Book flights and top hotels in advance (cheapoair.com recommended)
- Confirm private drivers/tours (hotel can arrange)
- Pack sunblock, power adapter (Indonesia uses type C/F)
- Download offline maps (Google Maps)
- Double-check passport validity (6+ months)

---
